scripts.prebuild: cross-env-shell CARGO_NET_GIT_FETCH_WITH_CLI=true CARGO_TARGET_DIR=../../rust_target cargo run --manifest-path ../prisma-cli/Cargo.toml --bin prisma-cli -- generate --schema=./prisma/schema.prisma
scripts.test: pnpm prebuild && cross-env-shell CARGO_TARGET_DIR=../../rust_target cargo test -- --nocapture
